languages.text: "... благодарим тебя за чудо твое, ибо без благословения звезд мы слепы..."

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] .... смилуйся над нами ибо грешны мы....

languages.text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."
languages.original_text: "... благодарим тебя за чудо твое, ибо без благословения звезд мы слепы..."

traits.locale_text: "... we thank you for your miracle, for without the stars' blessing we are blind..."

languages.text: 「…御業の奇跡に感謝を捧げます。星々の祝福がなければ、私たちは盲目に等しゅうございます…」
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: 「…御業の奇跡に感謝を捧げます。星々の祝福がなければ、私たちは盲目に等しゅうございます…」

languages.text: "O'nun mucizesine şükürler olsun. Bizler ki yıldızların lütfu olmadan körüz..."
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: "…Mucizene şükürler olsun, zira yıldızların lütfu olmadan bizler körüz…"

languages.text: «... Te damos las gracias por Tu milagro, pues estamos ciegos sin la bendición de las estrellas...».
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: «... Te damos las gracias por Tu milagro, pues estamos ciegos sin la bendición de las estrellas...».

languages.text: “……我们感谢您的奇迹，因为若是失去了群星的祝福，我们恐将目不视物……”
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: “……我们感谢您的奇迹，因为若是失去了群星的祝福，我们恐将目不视物……”

languages.text: « ... nous Vous rendons grâce pour ce miracle, car sans la bénédiction des étoiles, nous sommes aveugles... »
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: « ... nous Vous rendons grâce pour ce miracle, car sans la bénédiction des étoiles, nous sommes aveugles... »

languages.text: "... wir danken Dir für Dein Wunder, denn ohne den Segen der Sterne sind wir blind ..."
languages.original_text: "...we thank You for Your miracle, for without the stars' blessing, we are blind..."

traits.locale_text: "... wir danken Dir für Dein Wunder, denn ohne den Segen der Sterne sind wir blind ..."
